mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `sys_user` su LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON su.id = sa.user_id AND sa.`status` = 0 WHERE su.id = #{id};

SELECT DISTINCT su.user_name, su.id, sa.avatar_url, sp.photo_url, sr.help_times FROM `sys_user` su LEFT JOIN sys_photos sp ON su.id = sp.user_id AND sp.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_rank sr ON su.id = sr.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON su.id = sa.user_id AND sa.`status` = 0 WHERE su.id = #{id};
SELECT su.id, su.user_name, sa.avatar_url FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON su.id = sa.user_id WHERE su.id = #{userId} AND sa.`status` = 0;
